title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 181 - Warrants And Awol's-policies And Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 181 - Warrants And Awol's-policies And Procedures

State Regulations
§ 181.1 - Absence without official authorization (awol)
§ 181.2 - Steps when a youth is considered awol
§ 181.3 - Time for requesting and issuance of warrants; notification
§ 181.4 - Issuance of warrants
§ 181.5 - Persons authorized to issue warrants
§ 181.6 - General warrant issuance procedure
§ 181.7 - Procedure when a youth on whom a warrant has been issued has been found
§ 181.8 - Responsibilities of a division for youth employee if an awol youth threatens to run away from the employee
§ 181.9 - Steps a division for youth employee must take to return a youth to program
§ 181.10 - Facility responsibilities for the return of awol youth
§ 181.11 - Removal of youth from a local detention center
§ 181.12 - Reporting procedures for absentees and warrants
§ 181.13 - Local practices pertaining to the issuance and execution of warrants
§ 181.14 - Detention facilities and awol's

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 181

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §
524

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
